item.title: Israel to reopen Gaza crossing after search for last dead hostage's body ends
item.description: Israel's military says its troops are searching for the remains of Ran Gvili, reportedly at a cemetery in northern Gaza.

item.title: Gold tops $5,000 for first time ever, adding to historic rally
item.description: Gold is seen as a so-called safe-haven asset that investors buy in times of uncertainty and low interest rates.

item.title: UK braces for severe wind and rain as Storm Chandra named
item.description: Chandra is the third major storm to hit the UK this month, after Goretti and Ingird caused widespread damage and destruction.

item.title: Police to be set 15-minute response target for some 999 calls
item.description: The Home Office says its plans to cut red tape will see officers spending more time out on the streets.

item.title: Trump says his administration 'reviewing everything'
item.description: The US president was asked by the Wall Street Journal whether the immigration agent who shot dead a man in Minneapolis had done the right thing.
